      • scopesMatch

        boolean scopesMatch(Set<String> expected,
                  Set<String> actual)
        Test whether the scopes in both sets are compatible, with special processing for structured scopes. All scopes in "actual" must exist in "expected". If a scope in "expected" is structured and has a value, it must be matched exactly by its corresponding scope in "actual". If a scope in "expected" is structured but has no value, it may be matched by a scope with or without a value in "actual".

      • removeRestrictedScopes

        Set<String> removeRestrictedScopes(Set<String> scopes)
        Remove any system-restricted scopes from the set and return the result.
        Parameters:
        scopes -
        Returns:
